post:
WHUK a company backed by a decade of Industry experience offers fully managed virtual private server windows hosting services with near double resources and at the best competitive prices. Virtual servers built on Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers housed in Tier IV data centers, ensures the delivery of nothing less that 99.95% uptime. This setup ensures optimum performance and offers the flexibility to run large websites and install third party applications with ease. Powered by Microsoft Hyper-V technology, it provides with maximum efficiency and uptime of the website.
